price: ក្រោយមកយើងបានបង្កើតគេពីទឹកកាមនៅក្នុងកន្លែង ដែលមានសុវត្ថិភាព(នៅក្នុងស្បូន)។
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
